item.title: Closed pl0x
item.dc:creator: @samanthapk samanthapk
item.description:
@samanthapk wrote:

lol well this shit is getting funnier to me then ever so what if u dont like me hell none of you like each other anyways im tired of hearing nubs say they lost this much and so called this much matt did his job by keeping the server running with almost no downtime for along time and if u say he has failed as a server owner shit then almost all rscserver fail people donate because they want the server to live and go on. and some just want the stuff u get from donating but all the whiners out there are being stupid hell woith all this shit going on pp2p is still up and running and u all know this so why cry about it matt was one of the best owners around and he made a good game. so many peeos pked and other stuff why u keep talking shit get over it.

Read full topic

item.title: Closed pl0x
item.dc:creator: @Jessekinss Jessekinss
item.description:
@Jessekinss wrote:

[quote=“rscpkftw, post:88, topic:301151”][quote author=Jessekinss link=topic=397447.msg2977403#msg2977403 date=1254368742]

well tbh i liked pp2p alot and i never donated so i dont care what peeps say lol and if i had donated for it i wouldnt give a damn about what they say matt did. so wtfever all you peeps do is cry about this server leave it and sdfu plz no1 wants to hear u thanks

well omg im gonna continue writing as if i know waht im talkin about and pretend that my opinion is important and taht my presence in this “community” is needed (or even welcome), k guise?

I find that pretty funny seeing as you’ve been banned/muted from here numerous of times. If they closed registrations we would see you in the obituary for suicide.
[/quote]

unlikely, as not everyone lives in the same area as me[/quote]

That made no sense.

item.description:
@nacional wrote:

[quote=“N Y T R I X, post:83, topic:301151”][quote author=pp2p Ghetto link=topic=397447.msg2975010#msg2975010 date=1254223862]
Its sad rscemulation(mainly staff) comes here and troll and incite, I’m going to pm some of the uppers and see If they can hold the members of that server accountable for comming and disrupting other’s advertisement pages, very imature of them.

as always pp2p has been up for ages, been threw alot of the rsc players, playes tend to jump from server to server, and suprisingly alot of players find they like pp2p and stay for months upon months addicted to the friendly players and adictive gameplay.

Altho there are alot of great rsc servers out there, I feel this one is the best.
[/quote]

Was I the only one that lol’d at this?[/quote]

No you weren’t.
If p2p had anything good, it was the forums.
